item.title: Some configurations
item.description: Go’s configuration in VScode Setting up Go in Windows Problem: Could not download VScode plugins of Go due to a famous firewall(I guess). here is the reference. Solvation: This is the old version(abandoned): go env -w GO111MODULE=on go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.io,direct Open cmd or powershell and run the following commands: go env -w GO111MODULE=on go env -w GOPROXY=https://proxy.golang.com.cn,direct Then restart VScode and install the Go plugins again, you should succeed.
